name: Déjà Vu (itch) (EricFreeman)
description:
A minimalist puzzle game about life, death, and clones.

Created by Eric Freeman & Danielle Yoseloff

Features
  • 50 levels
  • Abstract sci-fi story
  • Dark Mode and Colorblind Mode
  • Localized in 13 languages (English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Hindi)
Steam key available on request after purchase of Itch.io edition.
